topic.title: [Want] Good Gallery App for ZeroNet
topic.body: Artist here, want to publish anonymously my work. Any suggestions?

topic.title: Why some ZN sites do not support cloning?
topic.body: Is there reason why many ZN websites do not support cloning?

topic.title: Has anyone been able to setup and run Nullchan (0chan.bit) clone?
topic.body:
I do the following:

Create site
Copy nullchan in the created site dir
Sign site
Publish site

But all I get is black screen, no content...

1_1CGidpguPpSkqbX3c19P5NUtipRzLJenX.body: Even with ZeroBlog, I have to manually add images in the folder of my site, then link it in a post? Looks like there's huge niche for a gallery app that handles image uploads and is clone-able.

2_1KJFB4SEHaHCY11HMKsMGyth1mXKb3R5oY.body: Usually with these search engines, I always get 1 or 2 files failed update, is this a common thing?
